title: Search problems

title: Hyperlinks not working in Thunderbird Nebula 128.1.1esr
content: Thunderbird 128.1.1esr recently installed on Win10. Hyperlinks in incoming messages don't work. Totally dead. Firefox is set as default browser, works fine. If I copy the link location and paste it into Firefox it works fine. There is no "options" selection in the horizontal line menu. How do I get TBird to link to Firefox??

title: unable to send emails from thunderbird
content:
hello I am able to receive emails in Thunderbird but unable to send and this error message pops up:

sending of the message failed an error occurred while sending mail: outgoing server (SMTP) error. The server responded: connection refused OB115 149 163 161 is blacklisted. If you believe this to be in error please contact postmaster@bigpond.com

I have contacted the postmaster several times and he has advised that the error is due to the VPN I am connected to. Some VPN IPs have been blocked due to abuse. He suggested I bypass or disable the VPN which has now been done but I still cannot send any emails.

thank you and please help
creator: hillsec

title: incorrect display of received messages

title: Excessive CPU load and running of Windows Defender Antivirus Service
content:
As of 8/27 I have been having a terrible problem when running thunderbird. Thunderbird is very slow to respond to keystrokes, the CPU is running at like 25% and it's windows defender antivirus service that's using up the most CPU.

When I close thunderbird, windows defender stops taking up all the CPU.

Here' what I have installed.

Thunderbird 128.1.1esr (64-bit) 2024-08 Cumulative Update Preview for Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems (KB5041587)

It's mostly unusable.

I want to go back to the previous version of thunderbird and see if that fixes it. But how? Is anyone else having this problem?
creator: ddfridley
